summary: MY 2002 VOLKSWAGEN PASSAT HAS AN IGNITION COIL PROBLEM THAT CAUSES IT TO MISFIRE AND LOSE POWER.  THE CAR WAS IN A VW SERVICE CENTER FOR MORE THAN 2 WEEKS.  AFTER RECEIVING THE CAR BACK FROM THE DEALER THE PROBLEM HAS EXHIBITED ITSELF AGAIN.  VW CAN'T GUARANTEE THE PROBLEM WILL BE PERMANENTLY FIXED.  TS
